main event: Multiple witnesses reported sightings of an unidentified flying object in the Boston, Massachusetts area on September 9, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as circular and moving in a zig-zag pattern at speeds between 30 to 40 miles per hour., Professional police officers witnessed the object, as well as several civilians, indicating a credible source of observation., Witnesses reported the object was noiseless and had no visible means of propulsion., One witness described the object as being brighter than daytime light as it illuminated the area., The object was reported to change color during flight, moving from white to orange or red.
sighted object: unidentified flying object, described as circular and metallic
witness description: Witnesses included professional police officers and various civilians in the area.
